title: Transmigrating Into A Cannon Fodder - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient China   Beautiful Female Lead   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   R*pe   Transmigration   Villainess Noble Girls
author: 小二兔
description:
Lin Xiao Ci transmigrated as the female villain in a novel in ancient times. 

In order to get close to the male lead, her character has walked the path of seeking death. She decided to stay away from the male lead and his family and cherish her life. 

So she quickly prepared the divorce papers and delivered them to the male lead who had been set up by the original villain to marry her. 

“Husband, I would like to turn over a new leaf. In the past, I have used you and I have wronged you. Now, I will return your freedom to you” 

But the man, instead of being joyful, tore the divorce papers into pieces and fiercely said, “Dream on!”>
